StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetBilletTrainingPersonRecruitHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: @PersonID INT =0 AS SELECT r.Person_ID , r.Sequence_No , r.Billet_ID , r.Billet , r.Loca.on_ID , r.Loca.on , r.Billet_Begin_Date , r.Billet_End_Date , le.(convert(varchar, r.Billet_Begin_Date,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar, r.Billet_Begin_Date,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar, r.Billet_Begin_Date,102),2) Billet_Begin_Date_Fmt , le.(convert(varchar, r.Billet_End_Date,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar, r.Billet_End_Date,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar, r.Billet_End_Date,102),2) Billet_End_Date_Fmt , (CASE WHEN r.Billet_End_Date is null THEN DATEDIFF(month, r.billet_Begin_Date, getdate()) ELSE DATEDIFF(month, r.billet_Begin_Date, r.Billet_End_Date) END) MonthHeld , h.Billet_Held_Block , h.Billet_block_ID from M8412_Recruit_History r WITH (NOLOCK) , M8412_LK_Billet b , M8412_Billet_Held_block h where r.Billet_ID=b.Billet_ID and b.Billet_Held_Block = h.Billet_block_ID and r.person_id=@PersonID ORDER BY r.Billet_Begin_Date DESC --ORDER BY r.Sequence_No DESC
